**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

A clear and concise description of what the problem is. For example, "I'm always frustrated when I have to manually configure [...] because NixKraken doesn't support it yet."

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. What new option or behavior are you proposing?

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

```nix

  enable = true;
```
